feed.subtitle: Russian lies , war crimes , Russia , invasion of ukraine, kremlin, fake news, the true, no censure.

entry.title: Mariupol : bombing of residential area by the Russian army

link.title: Mariupol : bombing of residential area by the Russian army

entry.content: In Mariupol the Russian army continues to bomb residential areas. The inhabitants are dying under the Russian bombs. There is no water, no food, no heating.
entry.summary: In Mariupol the Russian army continues to bomb residential areas. The inhabitants are dying under the Russian bombs. There is no water, no food, no heating.

entry.title: Damage in Mariupol after the Russian bombing

link.title: Damage in Mariupol after the Russian bombing

entry.content:
In a residential area of Mariupol. Bombing of the Russian army. At least 1 civilian was killed.

source : twitter
entry.summary: In a residential area of Mariupol. Bombing of the Russian army. At least 1 civilian was killed. Sorry, your browser doesn't support embedded videos. source : twitter

entry.title: Bombing by Russia of a maternity hospital in Mariupol

link.title: Bombing by Russia of a maternity hospital in Mariupol

entry.content: Bombing by Russia of a maternity hospital in Marioupol which caused at least 3 deaths.
entry.summary: Bombing by Russia of a maternity hospital in Marioupol which caused at least 3 deaths.

entry.title: The russian army shoot the journalist guillaume briquet

link.title: The russian army shoot the journalist guillaume briquet

entry.content:
Russian troops fire on Swiss journalist Guillaume Briquet. He worked in the Mykolaiv region, his car marked PRESS was hit. They also stole his passport, money and equipment.

Sources : blick.ch
entry.summary: Russian troops fire on Swiss journalist Guillaume Briquet. He worked in the Mykolaiv region, his car marked PRESS was hit. They also stole his passport, money and equipment. Sources : blick.ch
